summary:
3 plugin signal(s) indicate an issue affecting app.example (https://app.example/login).

Key evidence:
- [Excavator] Backup archive exposed (MED)
- [Galdr] Response discloses login banner (LOW)
- [Seer] Hardcoded API key leaked (HIGH)

proof.summary: Reproduce the issue on app.example by following 2 synthesised steps.
steps:
Review plugin evidence: You are an AI security analyst. Summarise why the following signals combine into a single case.
Asset: app.example (web)
Attack vector: web (login)
Evidence:
- Plugin=excavator Severity=MED Message=Backup archive exposed
- Plugin=galdr Severity=LOW Message=Response discloses login banner
- Plugin=seer Severity=HIGH Message=Hardcoded API key leaked
Provide a concise narrative and highlight overlapping evidence.

Execute reproduction instructions synthesised from prompt: Synthesize deterministic reproduction steps for asset app.example (web).
Use at most 4 steps. Incorporate plugin observations:
- Excavator evidence: backup.zip
- Galdr evidence: Example Service v1.2.3
- Seer evidence: API_KEY=[REDACTED_SECRET]
Return concise imperative steps.

risk.rationale: Highest severity reported by contributing plugins: HIGH
